hero.name: Preshit Churi
hero.role: AI Data Specialist | Aspiring Product Leader

about.title: About Me
about.msg1: Hi there! I’m Preshit Churi, an AI Data Specialist and aspiring product leader passionate about building next-generation social technologies that connect people beyond screens and distance.
about.msg2: At Meta, I’ve worked on immersive AR/VR speech recognition systems and multimodal AI expansion, delivering user-centric solutions through cross-functional collaboration. My background blends technical depth in AI/ML, AR/VR, and data analytics with strong skills in product management, research, and design.
about.msg3: I thrive in fast-paced environments, leveraging data-driven insights and agile execution to scale impactful products.
about.msg4: Currently, I’m focused on advancing my expertise in product development, cloud technologies, and AI-powered user experiences—driving innovation at the intersection of technology and people.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.title1: Ready to get started on your project?
contact.title2: Contact me now for a Free consultation.
